title: Why are people playing Shaco recently?
body:
17/20 of my last games ive had a shaco jungler on the enemy team, so my question is why are people playing him again? I had not seen Shaco in such a long time and now its dperessing to look at LOL :p

Im guessing he's a counter of some kind to Kindred or possibly just unlucky on my queues?

replies.body: wow some one played a champ that was not meta hmmm he a bot

> [{quoted}](name=snakeowen,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=7kadG4bn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-16T16:11:18.527+0000)
>
> wow some one played a champ that was not meta hmmm he a bot

can confirm, bot
There are trends. When Jax is played a lot people find counters for Jax then the counter for Jax come in, and so forth. So people play Shaco because he was a counter of the last champ trend.
Because people finally found out about Shaclone

I'm sure someone famous played Shaco and now everyone's going insane and instalocking him immediately.

"Bjerg's match history says he played Shaco Tank support with this build... NEW META MUST FOLLOW MINDLESSLY BRAINSSSSSS"

Haha xsynx, you just always see me playing shaco xD

And that's because, shaco is really fun, especially when your enemies are soft ;)
Because Shaco is usually fun man, You can play him so many different ways and his jungling can really turn a game around.
